org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.xml.condition

Interface XmlFileDTD

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Condition, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XmlFile

    public interface XmlFileDTD
extends org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder
    The next step in building XmlFile condition after DTD was specified.
    Author:
    Matej Briskar

      • namespace

        XmlFileNamespace namespace(String prefix,
                         String url)
        Specify the namespace used in the xpath that was provided sooner. Use this only if you don't want to specify file regex of the file.
        Parameters:
        prefix - the namespace prefix
        url - the namespace url
        Returns:
        the last step in XmlFile definition to provide the variable name

      • as

        org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.ConditionBuilder as(String variable)
        The last step of building the XmlFile, specifying the variable name. Do not use this now if you want to specify some other parameters.
        Parameters:
        variable - variable name that will be saved in stack as the output of this condition.
        Returns:
